trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a property across application domain and process boundaries.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract> represents a property of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.

To access one or more properties of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
Then, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperty%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperties%2A> method.
Returns the `get` accessor of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the `get` accessor of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies; `null` if the property does not have a `get` accessor.
Returns information about the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData> structure includes the type of the property value and whether the property is readable or writable.

A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData"></xref> that provides information about the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
Returns the `set` accessor of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the `set` accessor of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies; `null` if the property does not have a `set` accessor.
Returns the value of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
It is recommended that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract.GetValue%2A> implementations throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the property is write-only.
The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> that identifies the object that contains the property.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to invoke the property.
An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"></xref> that specifies the index values for an indexed property; `null` if the property is not indexed.
A locale ID to use for locale-specific conversions that are performed by the property.
A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the property value.
Sets the value of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
It is recommended that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract.SetValue%2A> implementations throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the property is read-only.
The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> that identifies the object that contains the property.
A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the property value.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to invoke the property.
An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"></xref> that specifies the index values for an indexed property; `null` if the property is not indexed.
The locale ID that the property will use for any locale-specific type conversions.
